articles.title: Senate begins 'vote-a-rama' to advance Democrats' sweeping health and climate bill
articles.description: The Senate on Saturday voted to advance Democrats' sweeping health care and climate bill toward final passage -- putting the package on track to pass the chamber as soon as this weekend.
articles.content:

articles.author: Raja Razek and Christina Maxouris, CNN
articles.title: A fourth Muslim man was killed in Albuquerque after authorities said 3 similar killings may be connected
articles.description: Authorities in Albuquerque, New Mexico, announced Saturday a fourth Muslim man was killed overnight and there is "reason to believe" his death is related to three other recent killings of Muslim men.

articles.author: Sarah Rumpf
articles.title: 113 Haitian migrants in custody after boat runs aground off Florida coast
articles.description: Authorities intercepted a group of Haitian immigrants aboard a rustic sailing ship on Saturday afternoon off the coast of Key Largo, Florida.
articles.content:
Border patrol took 113 Haitian migrants into custody after their sailing-vessel ran aground off the coast of Florida Saturday afternoon.

articles.title: Beijing Simulates Attack on Taiwan as Chinese Exercises Extend Into Third Day
articles.description: Chinese military aircraft and ships crossed the halfway mark of the Taiwan Strait, in a simulated land strike on the self-governing island that Beijing claims as its own.
articles.content: A large number of Chinese military aircraft and ships crossed the halfway mark of the Taiwan Strait on Saturday, in a simulated land strike on the self-governing island that Beijing claims as its own… [+215 chars]

articles.title: What's next for Alex Jones? More defamation trials, more damages and, possibly, criminal charges
articles.description: Alex Jones has been ordered by an Austin, Texas jury to pay Sandy Hook parents nearly $50 million in total. What is next for the Infowars host?

articles.title: Ukraine Warns Hit to Nuclear Plant Could Equal 'Use of an Atomic Bomb'
articles.description: Russia is accused of shelling Zaporizhzhia, the largest nuclear plant in Europe, as the Ukraine war continues.

articles.title: Flooding in Death  Valley
articles.description: Flooding overtook several cars in California's Death Valley amid record floods that have stranded more than 1,000 people.
articles.content: Flooding overtook several cars in California's Death Valley amid record floods that have stranded more than 1,000 people.
